summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of East Howe Street, from Boyer Avenue to East Lynn Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7750 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
